name: The Unseeing Eye
description:
You wake up, blind, cold, and everything is dark. You realise you've been kidnapped. It's time to escape, but if he sees you, it's over. Use your other senses to escape, before it's too late...

Controls:

WASD: MOVE
Space: JUMP
HOLD C: CROUCH
Left Shift: SPRINT
Mouse: LOOK AROUND
HOLD L.Click&Drag: OPEN DOORS
L.Click: INTERACT WITH OBJECTS
R.Click: Throw pebble

Installation instructions: 

- Download the .zip folder.

- Extract it with all the files from the .zip folder.

- Run the .exe file from inside the folder.
